sql_string.css_tran_by_day: SELECT CASE WHEN C.ISS_INST='1001' THEN CT.AGENT_CODE WHEN C.ISS_INST='1001' AND C.ACQ_INST='1001' THEN Substr(C.Atmid,2,3) WHEN C.ISS_INST='9016' AND C.ACQ_INST='9016' THEN '000' ELSE Substr(C.Atmid,2,3) END BRANCH_CODE ,C.Atmid ,C.TRACE ,C.UTRNNO ,C.RESP ,case when C.Trans_Type in (609) then get_tag_data(217,c.bpc_addldata) else C.HPAN end as CARD_NUM --,C.HPAN ,C.ISS_INST ,C.ACQ_INST ,C.Receiveid ,C.PRCODE ,CASE WHEN C.ISS_INST='1001' THEN 'Hatthakasekar Limited' When C.ISS_INST not in ('1001') then ISD.BANK_NAME END AS ISS_BANK ,D.BANK_NAME AS ACQ_NAME ,CASE WHEN GET_TAG_DATA( 1625, C.BPC_ADDLDATA ) = '9116085' THEN 'Hatthakasekar Limited' When GET_TAG_DATA( 1625, C.BPC_ADDLDATA ) not in ('9116085') then BNB.BANK_NAME END AS BNB_NAME ,C.Switch_Date,C.TRANS_TYPE,C.Currency ,C.REQAMT/100 AS Tran_Amount ,C.DEBTFEEAMT/100 AS ACQ_FEE, C.ACCT1 AS SENDER_ACC, C.Acct2 AS BNB_ACC, C.Reversal, C.ACQINSTID, Case when c.trans_type = 609 then substr(GET_TAG_DATA( 217, C.BPC_ADDLDATA ),1,7) else substr (c.track2,2,7) end as ISS_BIN, GET_TAG_DATA( 1625, C.BPC_ADDLDATA ) as BNB_BIN, trunc (sysdate) as POST_DATE FROM CURR_TRANS C INNER JOIN tbl_net_bin_tab D ON C.ACQINSTID= d.START_BIN INNER JOIN css_settlement CSS on TO_CHAR(CSS.TRACE_NUMBER,'000000') = TO_CHAR (C.Trace,'000000') and TO_DATE(CSS.SETTLEMENT_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') = :P_DATE LEFT JOIN CREF_TAB CT ON CT.CREF_NO = case when c.trans_type = 609 then GET_TAG_DATA( 217, C.BPC_ADDLDATA ) else C.Hpan end LEFT JOIN tbl_net_bin_tab BD ON C.RECEIVEID=BD.BANK_CODE LEFT JOIN Net_Bin_Tab B ON GET_TAG_DATA( 1625, C.BPC_ADDLDATA ) = B.BANK_CODE LEFT JOIN tbl_net_bin_tab ISD ON ISD.START_BIN = case when C.Trans_Type = 609 then substr(GET_TAG_DATA( 217, C.BPC_ADDLDATA ),1,7) else Substr (c.track2,2,7) end left join tbl_net_bin_tab BNB on BNB.START_BIN = GET_TAG_DATA( 1625, C.BPC_ADDLDATA ) where C.Respcode = '00' and c.trans_type not in (508,782,725) and c.utrnno not in (Select c.utrnno from CURR_TRANS C1 where C1.Utrnno = C.Utrnno and C1.Reversal = 1 ) AND TO_DATE (c.switch_date,'YYYYMMDD') >= to_date(:P_DATE,'DD-MON-YYYY') -7
sql_string.css_trans_settlement: SELECT BK.BANK_NAME as BANK ,S.BANK ,S.ISS_INST ,S.ACQINSTID ,S.BNB_BIN ,s.CARD_NUMBER ,TO_CHAR(S.Branch_Code,'000') as Branch_Code ,S.TRAN_TYPE ,CASE WHEN S.TRAN_TYPE = 'Cash Withdrawal' THEN S.TRAN_AMOUNT WHEN S.TRAN_TYPE IN ('Balance Inquiry','Mini Statement','Pin Change') THEN 0 WHEN S.TRAN_TYPE IN ('IBFT2','IBFT3','IBFT4') AND S.CASH_TYPE='OUT CASH' THEN S.TRAN_AMOUNT WHEN S.TRAN_TYPE='IBFT1' AND S.CASH_TYPE='OUT CASH' THEN 0 WHEN S.TRAN_TYPE IN ('IBFT2','IBFT_HKL_BNB_ONLY') AND S.CASH_TYPE='INCOME CASH' THEN S.TRAN_AMOUNT WHEN S.TRAN_TYPE IN ('IBFT1','IBFT4','IBFT3') AND S.CASH_TYPE='INCOME CASH' THEN S.TRAN_AMOUNT END AS Settle_AMOUNT ,CASE /*WHEN S.TRAN_TYPE = 'Cash Withdrawal' THEN sum(S.ACQ_FEE)*/ WHEN S.TRAN_TYPE IN ('Balance Inquiry','Mini Statement','Pin Change','Cash Withdrawal') THEN S.ACQ_FEE WHEN S.TRAN_TYPE in ('IBFT1','IBFT3') AND S.CASH_TYPE='OUT CASH' THEN S.ACQ_FEE WHEN S.TRAN_TYPE IN ('IBFT2','IBFT4','IBFT3') AND S.CASH_TYPE='OUT CASH' THEN S.ACQ_FEE+S.BNB_FEE WHEN S.TRAN_TYPE = 'IBFT3' AND S.CASH_TYPE='OUT CASH' THEN S.BNB_FEE WHEN S.TRAN_TYPE = 'IBFT2' AND S.CASH_TYPE='INCOME CASH' THEN S.ACQ_FEE+S.BNB_FEE WHEN S.TRAN_TYPE IN ('IBFT1','IBFT4','IBFT3') AND S.CASH_TYPE='INCOME CASH' THEN S.ACQ_FEE WHEN S.TRAN_TYPE = 'IBFT_HKL_BNB_ONLY' AND S.CASH_TYPE='INCOME CASH' THEN S.BNB_FEE END AS Settle_FEE ,S.CASH_TYPE ,S.TRN_REF_NO ,S.CURRENY AS QTY ,TO_CHAR(S.trace_num,'000000') as trace_num ,S.Tran_Type ,S.utrnno FROM ( SELECT T.TRACE_NUM, CASE WHEN T.ISS_INST='1001' AND T.ACQ_INST='9016' THEN T.ACQINSTID WHEN T.ISS_INST='9016' AND T.Acq_Inst='1001' THEN T.ISS_BIN WHEN T.ISS_INST='1001' AND T.Acq_Inst='1001' THEN T.BNB_BIN WHEN T.ISS_INST='9016' AND T.ACQ_INST='9016' THEN T.ISS_BIN END AS BANK, T.ISS_INST, T.ACQINSTID, T.BNB_BIN, T.Branch_Code, CASE WHEN T.TRAN_TYPE='751' THEN 'Pin Change' WHEN T.TRAN_TYPE='704' THEN 'Mini Statement' WHEN T.TRAN_TYPE='702' THEN 'Balance Inquiry' WHEN T.TRAN_TYPE='700' THEN 'Cash Withdrawal' WHEN T.ISS_BIN = T.ACQINSTID AND T.ISS_BIN not in (T.BNB_BIN) AND T.ISS_INST='9016' AND T.ACQ_INST='9016' THEN 'IBFT3_HKL_BNB_ONLY' WHEN T.ISS_BIN = T.ACQINSTID AND T.ISS_BIN not in (T.BNB_BIN) THEN 'IBFT3' WHEN T.ISS_BIN = T.BNB_BIN AND T.ISS_BIN not in (T.ACQINSTID) THEN 'IBFT1' WHEN T.ISS_BIN not in (T.ACQINSTID) AND T.ACQINSTID = T.BNB_BIN THEN 'IBFT2' WHEN T.ISS_BIN not in (T.ACQINSTID) AND T.ACQINSTID not in (T.BNB_BIN) AND T.ISS_INST='9016' AND T.ACQ_INST='9016' THEN 'IBFT4_HKL_BNB_ONLY' WHEN T.ISS_BIN not in (T.ACQINSTID) AND T.ACQINSTID not in (T.BNB_BIN) THEN 'IBFT4' END AS Tran_Type, T.TRAN_AMOUNT, T.ISS_FEE, T.ACQ_FEE, T.BNB_FEE, CASE WHEN T.ISS_INST='1001' THEN 'OUT CASH' WHEN T.ISS_INST='9016' THEN 'INCOME CASH' END AS CASH_TYPE, CASE WHEN T.TRAN_CCY='840' THEN 'USD' WHEN T.TRAN_CCY='116' THEN 'KHR' END AS CURRENY, T.UTRNNO, T.SWITCH_DATE, S.SETTLEMENT_DATE, L.Trn_Ref_No AS TRN_REF_NO, T.ISS_NAME, T.CARD_NUMBER FROM Css_Transaction T INNER JOIN Css_Settlement S ON TO_CHAR(T.Trace_Num,'000000')=TO_CHAR(S.Trace_Number,'000000') Inner join curr_trans ct on ct.utrnno = t.UTRNNO LEFT JOIN SWTB_TXN_LOG L ON L.RRN = ct.refnum and l.RESP_CODE = '00' WHERE S.STATUS='S' AND TO_DATE(t.SWITCH_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') >= TRUNC (sysdate - 7) AND TO_DATE(s.SETTLEMENT_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') = :P_DATE ) S left join tbl_net_bin_tab BK on BK.START_BIN = S.BANK where S.UTRNNO not in (Select C1.utrnno from curr_trans C1 where C1.Reversal = 1)
sql_string.BAKONG_TOTAL_TRANS: Select TRUNC (a.bsa_date) as BSA_DATE , a.userid , count (*) as TOTAL_TRANS from TBL_BAKONG_TRNS a where a.bsa_date BETWEEN :SDATE and :EDATE group by a.bsa_date , a.userid order by a.bsa_date
sql_string.getconsumerlist: Select a.bill_id ,'L' || substr (a.payment_id,5,15) as customer_ID from offline_bills a inner join private_edc_list b on b.service_ID = a.service_ID
sql_string.get_del_ITO_after_uploaded: Delete from detb_upload_raw_ito t where t.Sources_Ref = 'WING_DIS_'||:CCY AND t.Ccy = :CCY and t.value_date = trunc(sysdate)
sql_string.get_ito_E_power_monthly:
WITH GETCOUNTTRNS as ( Select T.FIELD2 as BRANCH_CODE ,'573159111' as ACCOUNT_NO ,T.FIELD2 as ACCOUNT_BRANCH ,'C' as DR_CR ,T.FIELD4 as CCY ,count(*) as GETCOUNT ,case when T.FIELD4 = 'KHR' then 4000 when T.FIELD4 = 'USD' then 1 else null end as EXCHANGE_RATE ,'N/A' as DEPARTMENT_CODE ,trunc (SYSDATE) as VALUE_DATE ,'MSC' as TRN_CODE ,case when T.FIELD4 = 'KHR' then 'm801' when T.FIELD4 = 'USD' then 'm802' else null end as BATCH_NO ,'_573159111' as BATCH_DESC ,'381109113' as OFFSET_ACCOUNT ,'' as RAW_OPT1 ,'' as RAW_OPT2 ,'' as RAW_OPT3 ,'' as RAW_OPT4 ,'' as RAW_OPT5
FROM ( Select 'HKL' as FIELD1 ,RT.Branch_CODE as FIELD2 ,substr (PA.DATA,1,3) ||'-'|| Substr (PA.Data, 4,10) as FIELD3 --,RT.TXN_CCY as FIELD4 ,case when ct.Currency = '116' then 'KHR' when ct.Currency = '840' then 'USD' end as FIELD4 --,substr(L.TO_ACC,1,4) as Service_ID ,case when RT.TXN_CCY = 'USD' then TO_CHAR(RT.OFS_AMOUNT,'99999999999.99') when RT.TXN_CCY = 'KHR' THEN TO_CHAR(RT.OFS_AMOUNT,'99999999999.99') END as FIELD5 ,TO_CHAR(RT.TRN_DT,'yyyy') ||'-'|| TO_CHAR(RT.TRN_DT,'MM') ||'-'|| TO_CHAR(RT.TRN_DT,'DD') as FIELD6 ,TO_CHAR(RT.MAKER_DT_STAMP,'HH24:MI:SS') as FIELD7 ,L.RRN as FIELD8 ,L.TERM_ID as FIELD9 ,'A' as FIELD10 ,'P' as FIELD11 , CASE WHEN BL.Charge_From = 'O' THEN RT.OFS_AMOUNT - RT.CHG_AMT_1--(CT.Debpfeeamt/100) WHEN BL.Charge_From = 'T' then RT.OFS_AMOUNT ELSE NULL END AS AMT_NO_FEE ,BL.CBS_ID as CBS_ID ,RT.TRN_REF_NO as TRN_REF --,TRUNC(TO_DATE(ct.switch_date,'yyyymmdd')) as SWITCH_DATE_REAL ,RT.TRN_DT as SWITCH_DATE_REAL FROM Detb_Rtl_Teller RT inner join SWTB_TXN_LOG L on l.trn_ref_no = RT.Trn_Ref_No and RT.XREF = L.XREF inner join curr_trans ct on ct.utrnno = trunc(l.rrn) and CT.Reversal = 0 left join t_pmt_trans pa on pa.utrnno = ct.sv_trace and pa.param = '4' INNER JOIN BILLER_LIST BL on BL.Service_Id = substr(L.TO_ACC,1,4) AND BL.Pro_Type = 'P'
union all
SELECT 'HKL' AS FIELD1 ,btxn.COD_BRANCH AS FIELD2 ,SUBSTR(BTXN.COD_BILL_NO,1,3) || '-' || SUBSTR(BTXN.COD_BILL_NO,4,LENGTH(BTXN.COD_BILL_NO)) AS FIELD3 ,BTXN.COD_BILL_CCY AS FIELD4 ,CASE WHEN EL.CHARGE_FROM= 'O' THEN TRIM(TO_CHAR((btxn.COD_NET_PAID ),'99999999999.00')) WHEN EL.CHARGE_FROM= 'T' THEN TRIM(TO_CHAR(btxn.Cod_Bill_Amt,'99999999999.00')) ELSE NULL END AS FIELD5 ,to_char(btxn.maker_dt_stamp,'yyyy') || '-' || to_number(TO_CHAR(btxn.maker_dt_stamp,'MM')) || '-' || to_number(TO_CHAR(btxn.maker_dt_stamp,'DD')) AS FIELD6 ,SUBSTR(to_char(btxn.maker_dt_stamp,'HH24:MI:SS'),1,5) AS FIELD7 ,SUBSTR(btxn.cod_reference_no,8,length(btxn.cod_reference_no)) AS FIELD8 ,SUBSTR(BTXN.MAKER_ID,5,LENGTH(BTXN.MAKER_ID)) AS FIELD9 ,'B' AS FIELD10 ,'P' AS FIELD11 ,CASE WHEN EL.CHARGE_FROM='O' THEN btxn.COD_NET_PAID - btxn.Cod_Chg_Amt1 WHEN EL.CHARGE_FROM='T' THEN btxn.Cod_Bill_Amt ELSE NULL END AS AMT_NO_FEE ,EL.CBS_ID ,TO_CHAR(btxn.Cod_Reference_No) AS TRN_REF ,trunc(btxn.maker_dt_stamp) AS SWITCH_DATE_REAL from Uptb_Ptxn_Log btxn inner join BILLER_LIST EL ON TO_CHAR(EL.CBS_ID)=TO_CHAR(BTXN.COD_INST_ID) AND EL.PRO_TYPE='P' where btxn.auth_stat='A' and btxn.once_auth='Y' and btxn.record_stat='L' --AND SUBSTR(BTXN.MAKER_ID,5,LENGTH(BTXN.MAKER_ID)) not in ('MOBILE') AND btxn.COD_REFERENCE_NO NOT IN (SELECT R.TRN_REF_NO FROM PRIVATE_EDC_REVERSAL R)
) t WHERE T.FIELD4 = :CCY AND T.SWITCH_DATE_REAL BETWEEN :SDATE AND :EDATE group by T.FIELD2 ,T.FIELD4 )
SELECT RANK() OVER (ORDER BY G.BRANCH_CODE,G.ACCOUNT_NO) as CUR_NO ,G.BRANCH_CODE ,G.ACCOUNT_NO ,G.ACCOUNT_BRANCH ,G.DR_CR ,G.CCY ,G.AMOUNT ,G.EXCHANGE_RATE ,G.AMOUNT_LCY --,G.DEPARTMENT_CODE ,G.VALUE_DATE ,G.TRN_CODE ,G.BATCH_NO ,G.BATCH_DESC ,G.OFFSET_ACCOUNT ,G.RAW_OPT1 ,G.RAW_OPT2 ,G.RAW_OPT3 ,G.RAW_OPT4 ,G.RAW_OPT5 FROM (Select F.BRANCH_CODE ,F.ACCOUNT_NO ,F.BRANCH_CODE as ACCOUNT_BRANCH ,F.DR_CR ,F.CCY ,case when F.CCY = 'KHR' then sum (F.getcount) * 400 when F.CCY = 'USD' then sum (F.getcount) * 0.1 else null end as AMOUNT ,F.EXCHANGE_RATE ,case when F.CCY = 'KHR' then ROUND(sum (F.getcount) * 400 / F.EXCHANGE_RATE,2) when F.CCY = 'USD' then ROUND (sum (F.getcount) * 0.1 / F.EXCHANGE_RATE,2) else null end as AMOUNT_LCY ,F.DEPARTMENT_CODE ,F.VALUE_DATE ,F.TRN_CODE ,F.BATCH_NO ,sum (F.getcount) || F.BATCH_DESC as BATCH_DESC ,F.OFFSET_ACCOUNT ,F.RAW_OPT1 ,F.RAW_OPT2 ,F.RAW_OPT3 ,F.RAW_OPT4 ,F.RAW_OPT5 from GETCOUNTTRNS F group by F.BRANCH_CODE,F.CCY,F.ACCOUNT_NO,F.DR_CR,F.EXCHANGE_RATE,F.DEPARTMENT_CODE,F.VALUE_DATE ,F.TRN_CODE,F.BATCH_NO,F.BATCH_DESC,F.OFFSET_ACCOUNT,F.RAW_OPT1,F.RAW_OPT2,F.RAW_OPT3,F.RAW_OPT4 ,F.RAW_OPT5
union all
Select F.BRANCH_CODE ,'168000072169' as ACCOUNT_NO ,'080' as ACCOUNT_BRANCH ,F.DR_CR ,F.CCY ,case when F.CCY = 'KHR' then sum (F.getcount) * 100 when F.CCY = 'USD' then ROUND(sum (F.getcount) * 0.025,2) else null end as AMOUNT ,F.EXCHANGE_RATE ,case when F.CCY = 'KHR' then ROUND(sum (F.getcount) * 100 / F.EXCHANGE_RATE,2) when F.CCY = 'USD' then ROUND (sum (F.getcount) *0.025 / F.EXCHANGE_RATE,2) else null end as AMOUNT_LCY ,F.DEPARTMENT_CODE ,F.VALUE_DATE ,F.TRN_CODE ,F.BATCH_NO ,sum (F.getcount) || '_168000072169' as BATCH_DESC ,F.OFFSET_ACCOUNT ,F.RAW_OPT1 ,F.RAW_OPT2 ,F.RAW_OPT3 ,F.RAW_OPT4 ,F.RAW_OPT5 from GETCOUNTTRNS F group by F.BRANCH_CODE,F.CCY,F.DR_CR,F.EXCHANGE_RATE,F.DEPARTMENT_CODE,F.VALUE_DATE ,F.TRN_CODE,F.BATCH_NO,F.OFFSET_ACCOUNT,F.RAW_OPT1,F.RAW_OPT2,F.RAW_OPT3,F.RAW_OPT4 ,F.RAW_OPT5 )G
sql_string.PR_DAILY_ATMCARD_ACTIVE_LIST: Select sca.BRANCH_CODE as ACC_BRN ,cd.agent_code as ATM_BRN ,cd.card_id as CARD_ID ,cd.cref_no as CARD_NUM ,sca.CUST_NO as CIF ,sca.CUST_AC_NO as SAVING_ACCT ,decode (cd.contract_id,'851','MyATM','852','MyVIP','115','MyATM','112','MyVIP','MyATM') as ATM_CARD_TYPE --,FN_getcardchdname(cd.card_id ,cat.acct_no ) as cardholder_name ,CD.EMBOS_NAME as cardholder_name ,sca.ACCOUNT_CLASS ,to_date(to_char(decode(length(cd.issue_dt),7, '0' || cd.issue_dt,cd.issue_dt)),'DDMMYYYY') as ISSUED_DATE ,LAST_DAY(TO_DATE(CD.exp_dt,'YYYYMM')) EXPIRED_DATE ,decode (cd.cd_capt,'0','VALID','1','CALL_ISSUER','14','FORCE_PIN','20','TEM_BLOCK') as CARD_Status ,UDF.FIELD_VAL_6 AS STAFF_ID from cref_tab CD Inner join card_acct_tab cat on cat.card_no = cd.cref_no and cat.acct_type not in (0) inner join sttm_cust_account sca on sca.CUST_AC_NO = cat.acct_no and sca.RECORD_STAT = 'O' LEFT JOIN CSTM_FUNCTION_USERDEF_FIELDS UDF ON sca.BRANCH_CODE || '~' || sca.CUST_AC_NO || '~'= UDF.REC_KEY AND UDF.function_id = 'STDCUSAC' left join VAPP_DATA_NP ad2 on ad2.ELEMENT_ID = '10000179' and ad2.ELEMENT_VALUE = CD.Card_Id left join app_application a on (ad2.appl_id) = to_char (a.id) Where substr (CD.CREF_NO,1,4) in ('9116','9168') AND LAST_DAY(TO_DATE(CD.exp_dt,'YYYYMM')) > = :P_SDATE AND cd.cd_capt in ('0','1','14','20') AND cat.acct_no not in ('000001915110','000001915123','000001915075') AND to_date(to_char(decode(length(cd.issue_dt),7, '0' || cd.issue_dt,cd.issue_dt)),'DDMMYYYY') <= :P_SDATE
sql_string.get_del_ITO_after_uploaded_True: Delete from detb_upload_raw_ito t where t.Sources_Ref = :p_reference AND t.Ccy = :CCY and t.value_date = trunc(sysdate)
sql_string.get_VISA_SETTLEMENT_SERVICE_TYPE: Select TO_CHAR(a1.sttl_date)as sttl_date ,case when a1.bus_mode = 1 then 'TOTAL-ACQUIRER' when a1.bus_mode = 2 then 'TOTAL-ISSUER' when a1.bus_mode = 3 then 'TOTAL-OTHER' when a1.bus_mode = 9 then 'NET-SETTLEMENT' end as NAME ,case when a1.credit_amount >0 then TO_CHAR((a1.credit_amount/100),'FM9,999,999.00') when a1.credit_amount <=0 then TO_CHAR(a1.credit_amount/100) end as credit_amount ,case when a1.debit_amount > 0 then TO_CHAR((a1.debit_amount/100),'FM9,999,999.00') when a1.debit_amount <= 0 then TO_CHAR(a1.debit_amount/100) end as debit_amount ,case when a1.net_amount > 0 then TO_CHAR((a1.net_amount/100),'FM9,999,999.00') when a1.net_amount <=0 then TO_CHAR(a1.net_amount/100) end as NET_AMOUNT from main.VIS_VSS2 a1 where a1.sttl_service = :SERVICE_TYPE AND a1.sre_id = case when a1.sttl_service = '139' then '9000642386' when a1.sttl_service = '146' then '9000642389' when a1.sttl_service = '1' then '9000642383' end AND a1.amount_type = 'T' AND a1.sttl_date between :P_SDATE and :P_EDATE
